author: William Feuer
title: California Gov. Gavin Newsom unveils guide to lifting coronavirus restrictions
description: Even once the stay-at-home order is lifted, Newsom said society won't snap back to normal.
content:
California Gov. Gavin Newsom announced Tuesday a guide to how California will reopen society and the economy across the state as officials weigh lifting restrictive orders meant to curb the spread of the coronavirus.
Newsom issued a statewide stay-at-home or… [+2390 chars]
